delete_member: When deleting a member, all data of the member will be removed. Are you sure you want to delete it?
delete_member_group: When deleting a member group, all members under the group will be deleted. Are you sure you want to delete it?
delete_tag: When deleting a tag, the tag will be removed from all articles. Are you sure you want to delete it?
delete_tag_group: When deleting a tag group, all tags under the group will be deleted. Are you sure you want to delete it?
